2023.10.21

Joomla system plugin ImportFontsGhsvs 2023.10.21

Checksum entities: `&lt;sha256&gt;725870dae2f826fd784877a72ac92756e27e08f96f07e1580c04533eec297e94&lt;/sha256&gt;`

Joomla system plugin. Downloads, saves and loads Google Fonts but does not use the IP of your page visitors for that which can be a legal violation in some countries.

### Joomla 5 ready

### Download
[plg_system_importfontsghsvs-2023.10.21.zip](https://github.com/GHSVS-de/plg_system_importfontsghsvs/raw/2023.10.21/dist/plg_system_importfontsghsvs-2023.10.21.zip)

### Joomla-Target-Platform(s)
3.&ast;, 4.&ast;, 5.&ast;

### For the interested ones
- [Compare releases 2022.08.22...2023.10.21](https://github.com/GHSVS-de/plg_system_importfontsghsvs/compare/2022.08.22...2023.10.21)
- minimumJoomla: 3.10.4
- maximumJoomla: 5.9999.9999
- minimumPhp: 7.4.0
- maximumPhp:
- Checksum: `<sha256>725870dae2f826fd784877a72ac92756e27e08f96f07e1580c04533eec297e94</sha256>`
- Readme: https://github.com/GHSVS-de/plg_system_importfontsghsvs#readme
- Updates XML: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GHSVS-de/upadateservers/master/plg_system_importfontsghsvs-update.xml
- Last tests: PHP 8.2<br>PHP 8.1<br>PHP 7.4<br>Joomla 3.10<br>Joomla 4.3<br>Joomla 5.0
- Language files: de-DE<br>en-GB
- Requires: Joomla's /media/ folder or at least /media/plg_sytem_importfonts/font/ must be writable for PHP (Joomla).
